name: Everlasting Summer: 7 Days of Summer Lost Alpha
name_original: Everlasting Summer: 7 Days of Summer Lost Alpha
description:
The main character of “7 Days of Summer: Lost Alpha” is a young man who leads a secluded life. Everything changes one evening on New Year's Eve, when he decided to leave the house and go on business, and instead found himself in a camp already familiar to the reader.

At first glance, history repeats itself: the bus, the camp, the girls... And nevertheless, small differences gradually accumulate, so that later develop into a completely new story. The hero (or rather heroes) plays an important role in this: he differs from the usual Semyon, and therefore his story is different.
